title: How to Make an Angry Pirate Drink

steps.headline: Pour the peach schnapps into the ice-filled glass.
Pour the island punch pucker into the glass.
Pour the coconut rum into the glass.
Pour the peach schnapps into the glass.
Pour the melon liqueur into the glass.
Pour the pineapple juice into the glass.
Shake or stir gently to mix.
Pour the mixture into an ice-filled glass.
(Optional) Garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

text: Fill a glass with ice.  Pour the peach schnapps into the ice-filled glass.  Pour the island punch pucker into the glass.  Pour the coconut rum into the glass.  Pour the peach schnapps into the glass.  Pour the melon liqueur into the glass.  Pour the pineapple juice into the glass.  Shake or stir gently to mix.  Pour the mixture into an ice-filled glass. Top with lemon-lime soda. (Optional) Garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.
